events.message: I received my order yesterday, but unfortunately the product has a large scratch on the surface and does not work properly.
The issue has been identified as a product defect due to the mentioned scratch and malfunctioning.
Your case has been assigned to our product support specialist to assist you further.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear about the condition of your product. Let me help you with this issue.
Could you please provide photos showing the scratch and any damage so we can assess the defect properly?
Thank you for your prompt reply. I have attached clear pictures of the scratch and the faulty part as requested.
We will send a replacement unit immediately at no extra cost. Please let us know if this is acceptable or if you prefer a refund.
A replacement sounds good to me, thank you for resolving this quickly and for the clear communication.
We’ve arranged for a replacement product to be shipped out today with expedited delivery.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the replacement and everything is working as expected.
Thank you for confirming the replacement is satisfactory. We are closing this case, but feel free to reach out if you need further assistance.
